decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly build up a board presence with efficient creatures and utilize cards like Earthbender Ascension and Esper Origins to maintain pressure on the opponent. With cards like Hunter's Talent and Snakeskin Veil to protect key creatures, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and efficient creature synergies. The inclusion of mana acceleration cards like Llanowar Elves and Fabled Passage allows for explosive starts and consistent mana development. Overall, the deck aims to push damage quickly and efficiently to secure victory.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly build a strong board presence of aggressive creatures while utilizing ramp abilities to speed up the player's mana production. By efficiently deploying low-cost creatures and utilizing cards like Earthbender Ascension and Escape Tunnel to maintain tempo and pressure, the aim is to overwhelm the opponent with early aggression and board control. The inclusion of cards like Esper Origins and Fabled Passage provide additional utility and card advantage, complementing the aggressive nature of the deck. Additionally, cards like Snakeskin Veil and Hunter's Talent offer protection and further enhance the deck's strategy.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board using a combination of removal spells and counterspells, while generating card advantage through card draw effects. The deck also aims to stall the game with defensive creatures and utility lands, before eventually overwhelming the opponent with powerful finishers like Artist's Talent and Combustion Technique. By carefully managing resources and disrupting the opponent's game plan, this deck aims to out-value and outlast its opponents in a battle of attrition.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with cards like Llanowar Elves and Botanical Sanctum to play big threats such as Gene Pollinator and Ouroboroid. With Spider-Sense and Nature's Rhythm to protect and support the creatures, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and efficient mana usage. Spider Manifestation and Badgermole Cub provide additional early game aggression, while cards like Great Divide Guide and Quantum Riddler offer flexibility and card advantage. The deck aims to establish a strong board presence and apply consistent pressure to secure victory.

The key concept of this UR Aggro deck is to use a combination of powerful aggressive creatures like Tiger-Seal and Duelist of the Mind, along with instant and sorcery spells like Boomerang Basics and Torch the Tower to quickly overwhelm and defeat the opponent. The deck also includes cards like Multiversal Passage and Stormchaser's Talent to maintain card advantage and tempo. Additionally, cards like Winternight Stories and Quantum Riddler provide additional utility and flexibility in combat situations. The deck aims to apply constant pressure on the opponent and close out the game quickly.

With a focus on quickly deploying powerful creatures and utilizing land ramp, this Selesnya Aggro deck aims to overwhelm opponents with efficient threats and mana acceleration. By combining aggressive creatures like Mossborn Hydra and Badgermole Cub with cards like Mightform Harmonizer and Esper Origins to boost their power, this deck is focused on maintaining a fast and consistent board presence. Additionally, cards like Lumbering Worldwagon and Escape Tunnel provide extra utility and evasion, while Earthbender Ascension can provide a game-ending finisher. This deck excels at applying pressure early and sustaining it throughout the game.

The main focus of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to quickly build up a strong board presence with low-cost creatures like Badgermole Cub and Llanowar Elves, while also utilizing powerful enchantments like Earthbender Ascension and Royal Treatment to buff up your creatures. The deck includes cards like Escape Tunnel and Fabled Passage to help with mana fixing and ramping. By overwhelming your opponent with an aggressive onslaught of creatures and utilizing powerful support cards like Mossborn Hydra, the goal is to quickly deal damage and secure victory.

The main concept of this deck is to create a fast-paced aggressive strategy utilizing a combination of creature buffs, land ramp, and evasion abilities. By quickly ramping up mana with cards like Llanowar Elves and Fabled Passage, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with powerful creatures like Mightform Harmonizer and Badgermole Cub. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Earthbender Ascension and Nature's Rhythm to provide additional support and ensure the creatures can push through to deal damage. Overall, the deck focuses on building a strong board presence and attacking aggressively to secure a victory.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing cards like Spyglass Siren and Floodpits Drowner to control the board and maintain pressure, while also using cards like Phantom Interference and Stab to disrupt the opponent's game plan, the deck aims to secure victories through a combination of tempo advantage and efficient creature beats. The inclusion of cards like Cecil, Dark Knight and Enduring Curiosity provide additional synergy and card advantage to keep the pressure on the opponent.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of removal spells, card draw, and counterspells. It aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while building card advantage and eventually winning with powerful late-game threats like Marang River Regent and Ultima. The deck also utilizes versatile land cards like Sunbillow Verge and Riverpyre Verge to fix mana and provide additional utility. Ultimately, the key strategy is to outlast the opponent, control the board, and grind out a victory through incremental advantage.

The main idea behind this deck is to quickly overrun your opponent with aggressive creatures and direct damage spells. By using efficient creatures like Hired Claw and Burnout Bashtronaut, along with powerful spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike, you can apply constant pressure and finish the game before your opponent has a chance to stabilize. The inclusion of powerful creatures like Nova Hellkite and Ojer Axonil, Deepest Might adds another layer of threat to the deck, ensuring that you always have a way to close out the game.

The deck focuses on quickly generating mana with Llanowar Elves and Fabled Passage to play powerful creatures like Badgermole Cub and Earthbender Ascension. These creatures can quickly overwhelm the opponent with their aggressive abilities and high power/toughness. Additionally, cards like Winternight Stories and Ba Sing Se provide additional support and card advantage to keep the pressure on the opponent. The deck utilizes a mix of green and blue spells to maintain a fast and threatening board presence while disrupting the opponent's game plan.

The main concept of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to quickly establish a board presence and overwhelm the opponent with a combination of powerful creatures and land acceleration. The deck focuses on using cards like Llanowar Elves and Fabled Passage to ramp up to bigger threats like Mossborn Hydra and Lumbering Worldwagon. Additionally, cards like Mightform Harmonizer and Badgermole Cub provide additional utility and synergies within the deck. Overall, the goal is to apply pressure early and maintain a strong board presence to secure a quick victory in a standard 1 vs 1 match.

The main focus of this deck is to overwhelm opponents quickly with aggressive creatures in a Mono Green Aggro strategy. The deck includes cards that allow for efficient mana ramping, creature buffs, and creature evasion to maintain pressure on the opponent. By utilizing cards like Ba Sing Se, Earthbender Ascension, and Mightform Harmonizer, the deck aims to create a fast and consistent board presence to outpace and overpower opponents before they can establish their own game plan.

The main concept of the deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy focused on building up a strong board presence using powerful creatures such as Badgermole Cub and Icetill Explorer. The deck utilizes cards like Archdruid's Charm and Earthbender Ascension to support its aggressive playstyle, while also incorporating cards like Felidar Retreat and Great Divide Guide for additional value and options. The inclusion of cards like Fabled Passage and Escape Tunnel ensures consistency and mana efficiency, making Selesnya Aggro a formidable force in 1 vs 1 Standard matches.

The main objective of this deck is to control the game by using a variety of spells and abilities to remove your opponent's threats and counter their plays. Utilize cards like Abandon Attachments and Boomerang Basics to disrupt their strategy while building up your own resources with Accumulate Wisdom and Artist's Talent. Finish off your opponent with powerful spells like Firebending Lesson and Combustion Technique. Use the versatile mana base and card draw provided by Multiversal Passage and Gran-Gran to outvalue and outmaneuver your opponent in order to secure victory.
